text: Akham is a Meitei family. It is native to Ancient Kangleipak (Antique Manipur). People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India.http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/surname- info.aspx?surname=Akhamhttp://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/surname.aspx?surname=Akham == References == Category:Meitei surnames
title: Akham
